phone.title: Please enter your phone number
phone.titleDescription: We use your phone number only to verify all users in Buddy.
phone.footer: We do not share this information or display it on your profile.

verification.title: We've just sent a verification code!
verification.notReceived: Please enter the code within the time limit.

notification.title1: Would you like Buddya to notify you
notification.title2: for quick chats with new friends?
notification.description1: Allow notifications to help you use

studentInfo.description1: The personal information on your student ID must be accurate
studentInfo.description2: as it will be used to verify each other on Buddya!

universitySelect.title: Are you a Sejong University student?

name.title: Please enter your name.
name.description: English names are used in Buddyya.
name.footer: Your name will be displayed on the Buddyya student ID.

country.title: Select your country
country.description: Please select the country where you currently reside

language.title: What languages do you speak?
language.description: We'll display it on your profile and help you find great matches who speak the same languages
language.maxSelect: You can select up to {{count}} languages

major.title: What are you studying at university?

interest.title: Select your interests
interest.description: Choose your interests and meet awesome friends with similar hobbies!
